Message:
Do you know the legend
of the swordsmaster
of the twin blades?

With her being undefeated,
unrivaled, and all-powerful...

she was the founder of
our great family.

It’s said she lived as if
she was one with the sword
before meeting her end
on the battlefield.

The founder learned
techniques at eight years old
that I learned at seven!

And yet, nothing will
stop everyone from
saying “founder this”
and “founder that...”

Sure, the founder’s
worthy of all the praise,
but records were made
to be broken.

If everyone’s aiming to be
a swordsmaster like her,

then I’ll aim even higher...
and carve out a legend
that outshines hers!

My admiration drives
me to outshine her...
